Text: Sam , ur rips r gr8 ! But 10 GB for a movie is a bit too much. Many uploaders manage 1080p in less then 2 GB . Lamhe is my most favorite movie but still I would not go to download it because of 10 GB.Pls see if you can use a better compress method and make ur gr8 uploads more practical.Thanks !
